pages.about: About LearnGrow India: Our Mission and Team Main Courses About Us About LearnGrow India Empowering individuals through education to achieve personal and professional growth. Our Journey LearnGrow India was founded in 2010 with the vision of providing accessible and quality education to individuals across India. Starting as a small initiative to offer skill-based courses, we quickly grew into a renowned educational institution known for our innovative teaching methods and dedicated faculty. Over the years, we have expanded our course offerings to cover a wide range of subjects, from leadership and management to digital marketing and programming. Our commitment to excellence and student-centric approach has helped thousands of learners achieve their educational and career goals. Today, LearnGrow India continues to thrive as a leader in the education sector, driven by our passion for learning and our belief in the transformative power of education. Join us on our journey of knowledge and discovery! Our Mission Discover the driving force behind LearnGrow India and our dedication to empowering individuals through education. Join Us Today Start your learning journey with LearnGrow India and unlock your potential. Enroll Now Meet Our Team Learn about the talented individuals who make up LearnGrow India's leadership and instructional staff. Raj Kapoor Co-Founder & CEO Anjali lgalga Co-Founder & COO Amit Patel Head of Product Development Sneha Velga Marketing Director Vikram Singh Customer Support Lead Our Values Explore the core values that guide our educational philosophy and approach to student success. ✓ Excellence ✓ Integrity ✓ Innovation ✓ Collaboration ✓ Empowerment Frequently Asked Questions Find answers to the most common questions about our courses and services. What types of courses does LearnGrow India offer? LearnGrow India offers a wide range of courses including leadership and management, digital marketing, emotional intelligence, project management, stress management, and programming basics. How can I enroll in a course? You can enroll in a course by visiting our Contact Us page and filling out the form. A member of our team will reach out to you with the next steps. Are the courses available online? Currently, our courses are offered in-person at our various locations. We are working towards providing online courses in the future. What are the fees for the courses? The fees for each course vary. Please visit the Courses page for detailed information on the pricing of each course. What is the duration of the courses? The duration of our courses ranges from 3 to 8 weeks, depending on the specific course. Detailed information can be found on the Courses page. Can I get a refund if I am not satisfied with a course? Yes, we offer a refund policy if you are not satisfied with a course. Please refer to our Terms and Conditions page for more details. +91 225 370517 learngrow@gmail.com 8, Ghodbunder Rd, Samata Nagar Main Courses About Us Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Learn more. Got it!
pages.courses: Explore Professional and Personal Development Courses Main Courses About Us Welcome to Our Courses Discover the courses that will empower your career and personal growth. Choose Your Path to Success Explore our diverse categories of courses designed to meet your specific learning objectives. Leadership and Management Courses focused on developing your leadership and management skills, such as "Strategic Leadership" and "Project Management Essentials". Digital Skills Courses to enhance your digital proficiency, including "Digital Marketing Mastery" and "Basics of Programming". Personal Development Courses aimed at improving your personal skills, like "Emotional Intelligence" and "Stress Management Techniques". The Effectiveness of Our Courses At LearnGrow India, we prioritize the practical application of knowledge. Our courses are designed to provide you with the skills and insights necessary to excel in your chosen field. Each course includes interactive components, real-world examples, and expert guidance to ensure you gain valuable, actionable knowledge. We continuously update our course materials to keep pace with industry trends and advancements. This commitment to quality education ensures that our students are well-prepared to meet the challenges of the modern professional environment. Course Details Detailed information about a selected course, including curriculum, duration, price, and number of sessions per week. Leadership and Management Develop your leadership skills and learn effective management strategies. Duration: 8 weeks Price: ₹15,000 Sessions per week: 3 Digital Marketing Master the art of online marketing and grow your business presence. Duration: 6 weeks Price: ₹12,000 Sessions per week: 2 Emotional Intelligence Improve your emotional intelligence and interpersonal skills. Duration: 4 weeks Price: ₹8,000 Sessions per week: 2 Project Management Learn the essentials of project management and execution. Duration: 5 weeks Price: ₹10,000 Sessions per week: 3 Stress Management Techniques for managing stress effectively in personal and professional settings. Duration: 3 weeks Price: ₹5,000 Sessions per week: 1 Basics of Programming Introduction to programming concepts and coding basics. Duration: 7 weeks Price: ₹14,000 Sessions per week: 3 Ready to Enroll? Fill out the form below to get started on your learning journey with LearnGrow India. Contact Us Why Choose LearnGrow India Discover the benefits of learning with us and how we stand out from the rest. Experienced Instructors Our courses are led by industry experts with years of experience. Affordable Pricing We offer competitive pricing for all our courses, making education accessible. Flexible Schedule Our courses are designed to fit into your busy schedule with flexible timings. Certification Earn a recognized certification upon completing our courses. Continuous Support We provide continuous support and guidance throughout your learning journey. Learning Community Join a community of like-minded learners and grow together. +91 225 370517 learngrow@gmail.com 8, Ghodbunder Rd, Samata Nagar Main Courses About Us Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. pages.privacy-policy: LearnGrow India Privacy Policy Main Courses About Us Privacy Policy Welcome to LearnGrow India. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and how we ensure its security. 1. Information Collection We collect the following types of information: Personal Information: Name, email address, phone number, and other contact details provided when you sign up or contact us. Usage Data: Information on how you access and use our website, including your IP address, browser type, and pages visited. Cookies: Data collected through cookies to enhance your browsing experience. 2. Use of Information We use the information collected for the following purposes: To provide, operate, and maintain our services. To improve, personalize, and expand our services. To communicate with you, including customer service, updates, and promotional purposes. To process your transactions and manage your orders. To understand and analyze how you use our website. To develop new products, services, features, and functionality. 3. Sharing of Information We do not sell or trade your personal information. We may share your information with: Trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating our website and conducting our business. Legal authorities when required by law or to protect our rights. 4. Data Security We implement various security measures to protect your personal information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. We strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your data but cannot guarantee absolute security. 5. Cookies We use cookies to improve your browsing experience. You can set your browser to refuse cookies or alert you when cookies are being sent. However, some parts of our site may not function properly without cookies. 6. Third-Party Links Our website may contain links to third-party sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of these sites. We encourage you to read the privacy policies of any site you visit. 7. Children's Privacy Our services are not directed at children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we learn that we have collected such information, we will take steps to delete it. 8. Your Data Protection Rights You have the right to access, correct, update, or delete your personal information. To exercise these rights, please contact us at learngrow@gmail.com. 9. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. 10. Contact Us If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at learngrow@gmail.com. +91 225 370517 learngrow@gmail.com 8, Ghodbunder Rd, Samata Nagar Main Courses About Us Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. Learn more. Got it!
